titles.title: Fair Care Act of 2020
Fair Care Act of 2020
Fair Care Act of 2020
To address the high costs of health care services, prescription drugs, and health insurance coverage in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and Labor, the Judiciary, Oversight and Reform, House Administration, Rules, the Budget, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
